statements: SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE gene_name = 'ABC'
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE organism_name = 'XYZ'
SELECT organism_name, sequence_length FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE sequence_length > 100
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_data ORDER BY sequence_length DESC
SELECT id, gene_name, sequence_length FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE sequence_length BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE sequence_length > 100 ORDER BY gene_name ASC, organism_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, AVG(sequence_length) AS avg_length FROM dna_sequence_data GROUP BY gene_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT id, gene_name, organism_name, sequence_length FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE sequence_length BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT sequence, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM dna_sequence_data GROUP BY sequence HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT organism_name FROM dna_sequence_data WHERE sequence LIKE '%ATG%';
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = 5;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM dna_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM dna_analysis_results WHERE dna_id = 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ATG%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ATCG%';
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM dna_analysis_results WHERE dna_id = 4 ORDER BY analysis_type DESC;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, analysis_type, result FROM dna_analysis_results WHERE result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id, analysis_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE length > 100;
SELECT * FROM sequence_metadata WHERE data_quality >= 80 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, data_quality FROM sequence_metadata WHERE creator_id = 5;
SELECT sequence_id_1, sequence_id_2, relationship_type FROM sequences_relationship WHERE relationship_type = 'related';
SELECT id, sequence, length FROM dna_sequences WHERE length > 100 ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT id, sequence, length FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE 'ATG%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT s.sequence, m.sample_id, m.data_quality FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequence_metadata m ON s.id = m.id WHERE m.sample_id = 'SAMPLE123';
SELECT s.sequence, r.relationship_type FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequences_relationship r ON s.id = r.sequence_id_1 WHERE r.relationship_type = 'related' ORDER BY s.id ASC;

SELECT s.id, s.sequence, m.sample_id, r.sequence_id_2 FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequence_metadata m ON s.id = m.id JOIN sequences_relationship r ON s.id = r.sequence_id_1 WHERE r.relationship_type = 'related' ORDER BY s.id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT project_name, description FROM research_projects;
SELECT pattern_name, associated_sequence_id FROM patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'similar';
SELECT id, project_name, description FROM research_projects WHERE id > 2;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE research_project_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_name, associated_sequence_id FROM patterns WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, description FROM research_projects WHERE id = 2 OR id = 4;
SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Similar' AND sequence_one_id <> sequence_two_id;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_length > 100;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM sequence_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects WHERE project_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_length > 100;
SELECT * FROM sequence_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects WHERE project_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT a.annotation_id, b.sequence_data, a.annotation_data FROM sequence_annotations a JOIN dna_sequences b ON a.sequence_id = b.sequence_id;
